overview: 148 Stefano: Mostri dell'inerzia is a documentary with a biographical and social background released in 2011, written and directed by Maurizio Cartolano, based on an idea by Giancarlo Castelli. It tells the tragic story of Stefano Cucchi, 31, who died on 22 October 2009 while in custody.
title: 148 Stefano: Mostri dell'inerzia
